title: Perfect Crispy Roasted Duck
directions: Poke the skin of the duck all over with bamboo skewers
Place on a wire rack on a sheet pan and slowly pour boiling water over the bird to tighten the skin
Cover all over with dry brine (ratio of 1/4 cup salt to 1tbsp baking powder)
Place on baking rack on a sheet pan and leave in the fridge for 24 hours
When ready to cook, preheat oven to 300
Pat duck dry with paper towels and fill cavity with salt/pepper
Place 1 orange, 1 onion, 5 cloves garlic and some rosemary into the cavity and stitch the cavity shut with a bamboo skewer
Roast at 300 for 1 hour with breast side up
Flip breast side down and roast 1 hour
Flip breast side up and roast another 30 min (until skin begins to brown)
Remove from oven and bring temp to 425 - allow at least 15 minutes

While the oven comes to temp, make the glaze by reducing the juice of an entire orange, remove from heat and add the honey, sprig of rosemary and some diced garlic. Leave to infuse until ready to glaze.
Roast an additional 10 minutes, or until skin is crisp
Glaze the duck and then roast another 5 minutes, or until glaze is sticky
